mapper.insert: insert into t_department( name, intro, create_time, update_time, manager_id, parent_id, path, state ) value (#{name}, #{intro}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{manager_id}, #{parent_id}, #{path}, #{state})
mapper.update: update t_department set name=#{name}, intro=#{intro}, create_time=#{create_time}, update_time=#{update_time}, manager_id=#{manager_id}, parent_id=#{parent_id}, path=#{path}, state=#{state} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT d.*, e.id eid, e.username eusername, p.id pid, p.`name` pname FROM t_department d LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON d.manager_id = e.id LEFT JOIN t_department p ON d.parent_id = p.id WHERE d.id=#{id}
